text: Punxsutawney (; Lenape: Punkwsut√®nay) is a borough in Jefferson County, Pennsylvania, United States. It is northeast of Pittsburgh. It is most well known for the Groundhog Day tradition and "Punxsutawney Phil", the groundhog that resides there. ==References== Category:Boroughs in Pennsylvania
title: Punxsutawney, Pennsylvania
